chapters.title: Chapter 11: Just Another Sell-Sword
chapters.info: Mandevwin, p. 252—Pseudonym used by Mat in The Yearly Brawl to protect his true identity while in Ebou Dar. The real Mandevwin is an officer in the Band of the Red Hand. See also Mandevwin.

chapters.title: Chapter 33: The Prince's Tabac
chapters.info: Mandevwin, p. 322—Stocky one-eyed member of the Band of the Red Hand. He was with the Band from its first days in Cairhien, and now assists Faile in guarding the Tower's supplies. He has gray streaks in his hair and is missing an eye. Mat thinks him a good commander, but with the imagination of a brick. See also Mandevwin.
